scenes.background: [Monica] and [Bob] are discussing the task over video call while you are on leave.
scenes.description: ‘We really need your expertise on this. Can you quickly guide us through the process?’

options.text: Sure, I can guide you through it. Let's get this done together.
options.analysis: You demonstrated strong empathy and social skills by offering to help, but your self-regulation and motivation to maintain your leave were slightly lower.

options.text: I'm on leave, but I can give you some pointers quickly.
options.analysis: You balanced your time off with a willingness to help, showing good self-regulation, but your motivation and empathy were not particularly high.

options.text: I think you can handle this without me. Try to follow the guidelines I left.
options.analysis: You showed strong self-regulation by maintaining your boundaries, but your perception, empathy, and motivation to help were lower.
